description.value:
Known online as “The AkBattPackHack”, this simple, quick, and dangerous trick went viral on social media during Drift Crisis (Starfinder Drift Crisis) riots on Akiton, where outgunned residents incapacitated an entire robotic security force within a few minutes.

Prerequisite: Int 11

Benefit: Once per day as a standard action, you can damage two standard batteries you’re holding in order to vent their electricity as a melee attack; this is an extraordinary ability that otherwise functions as the spell @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.yFhvmdW0BnMHV3Sm]{jolting surge}. This damages both batteries beyond repair.

Jolting Surge

You touch a target with a device you’re holding that uses electricity, requiring a melee attack against the target’s EAC. Alternatively, you can instead touch an electrical device a target is wearing (or a target that is an electrical device, such as a robot) with your hand, gaining a +2 bonus to your attack roll. Either way, if your attack hits, the electrical device surges out of control, dealing 4d6 electricity damage to your target.

Casting this spell doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity.
